column1: UK HM Coastguard statistics, search and rescue operations: 1,2 1999-2011
1 HM Coastguard revised its statistical collection and collation procedures in 1998 and again in a phased programme between 2003 and 2005. Continuing ongoing
refinements to the data collection, recording and analyses may make comparisons  with previous years difficult. e.g. A change to data collection procedures in
2006 has resulted in a fall in the number of vessels recorded as 'assisted'.
2 Due to industrial action by some HM Coastguard staff, figures for 2007 to 2010 are incomplete.
3 Lives lost figures include all fatalities recorded by HM Coastguard (eg maritime, land based, natural causes, etc).

column14: Source: Maritime Accidents Investigation Branch (MAIB), DfT

column1: The figures in this table are outside the scope of National Statistics
